thread.title: Very fine hotel, great food, quiet rooms, fantastic pool, spa, gym, good location.

author: jrwshngtn
title: Very fine hotel, great food, quiet rooms, fantastic pool, spa, gym, good location.
text: I really enjoyed my stay here in Feb, 2017. The gym is very well equipped, pool is unique and realxing, restaurants are fantastic, and the location is central Beijing, modern hotel district, very pleasant place.The large bar downstairs has a very extensive collection of wine all displayed along the walls.
